Coding.name: HTML & CSS from Zero to Hero
Coding.description: In this course we will build the interface of 2 websites together, The Band & Shopee.

Coding.name: Responsive With Grid System
Coding.description: n this course we will learn about how to build a responsive web interface with Grid System, similar to Bootstrap 4.

Coding.name: Advanced Javascript Programing
Coding.description: Get a deeper understanding of how Javascript works, learn about IIFE, closure, reference types, this keyword, bind, call, apply, prototype, ...

Coding.name: Build Web with NodeJS & ExpressJS
Coding.description: Learn back-end with the Node & ExpressJS framework, understand the concepts of back-end work, and build a RESTful API for the site.

Coding.name: Basic Javascript Programing
Coding.description: Get a deeper understanding of how Javascript works, learn about IIFE, closure, reference types, this keyword, bind, call, apply, prototype, ...

Coding.name: Build website with ReactJS
Coding.description: ReactJS course from basic to advanced, after this course you can do most of the projects commonly encountered with ReactJS.

Coding.name: Working with Terminal and Ubuntu
Coding.description: Owning a modern terminal, powerful in customization and learning how to work with Ubuntu is an important step on the path to becoming a Web Developer.
